responses: What can I do for you?

patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses:
Woxsen University is a well-regarded private university located in Hyderabad, Telangana, India. Established in 2014 
 it has grown to offer a variety of undergraduate, postgraduate and PhD programs across seven schools.
Undergraduate Courses (UG): BBA (Hons.), B.Tech (various specializations), B.Des (Hons.), B. Arch, BA (Hons.) in various subjects, BA LLB (Hons.), B.Sc (Hons.) and BBA LLB (Hons.)
Postgraduate Courses (PG): MBA (various specializations), Ph.D. (various specializations)

patterns: how long will be B.Tech or BBA course
how long will it take to complete MBA course
responses: Our college offers 4 year long B.Tech course and 3 year long BBA course.
Our College offers 2 year long MBA course which can be specialized in 'General' , 'Business Analytics' , 'Financial Services'

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: Main Campus which is a 200-acre residential campus is located at Sadashivapet, which is about 60 kilometers from the main city center of Hyderabad.

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: In Woxsen we have trimester which can last upto 3 months. So in one academice year we have 3 trimesters.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses:
UG Courses : 
1. Minimum Academic Score: You'll typically need a minimum of 60% aggregate marks in your Class 12 exams from a recognized board. Specific programs, especially B.Tech., might require even higher marks in science subjects like Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. 
2. Entrance Exams: For some undergraduate programs, you might need to take and score well in entrance exams like the Woxsen Aptitude Test (WAT), XAT, CAT, NMAT, TSICET, or CBSE 12th marks depending on the program. 

PostGraduate Courses: 
1. Minimum Academic Score: For postgraduate programs like MBA, you'll typically need a minimum of 60% marks in your undergraduate degree. Doctoral programs may require even higher marks (around 75%). 
2. Entrance Exams: Entrance exams like GMAT, GRE, NMAT, XAT, CAT, or WAT (Woxsen Aptitude Test) are usually mandatory for MBA and some other postgraduate programs.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be two or three classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour and 30 minutes.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Hyderabad. We adopt teaching methodology of Ivy Leagues, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.
There are assignments which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
